TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebPartZoneCollection extends System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase
Public NotInheritable Class WebPartZoneCollection Inherits ReadOnlyCollectionBase

summary.span: 包含 控件的只读集合。

span.span: Contains a read-only collection of controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类包含一系列存在于 Web 部件页的控件。The class contains the collection of controls that exist on a Web Parts page. 它主要由控件来跟踪和管理所有区域。It is used primarily by the control to track and manage all the zones. 控制系统会对页面上的区域的集合的引用保留在其只读属性。The control keeps a reference to the collection of zones on a page in its read-only property. 类很有用，当你想要在同一时间执行对多个区域或其内容的操作或者需要以查找特定区域并检查或更改其内容。The class is useful when you want to carry out operations on multiple zones or their contents at the same time, or when you need to locate a particular zone and examine or change its contents. 尽管区域集合本身是只读的和不能更改的集合对象本身的大小，您仍然可以对在集合中的各个区域的引用和对各个区域对象的引用后，您可以更改其属性值。Although the collection of zones itself is read-only and you cannot change the size of the collection object itself, you can still get references to the individual zones within the collection, and when you have a reference to an individual zone object, you can change its property values. 类具有两个构造函数。The class has two constructors. 第一个，只需初始化一个新的空实例。The first one, , simply initializes an empty instance of a new . 第二个，通过传入的区域的现有集合来初始化集合。The second one, , initializes a collection by passing in an existing collection of zones. 类包含属性。The class contains an property. 此属性，可找到通过传入的字符串标识符集合内的控件。This property allows you to locate a control within the collection by passing in a string identifier. 该区域位于通过匹配的值的字符串标识符属性上的区域。The zone is located by matching the string identifier to the value of the property on a zone. 类还具有几个方法，可用于检查或访问其内容。The class also has several methods that are useful for examining or accessing its contents. 方法确定集合中是否存在特定区域。The method determines whether a particular zone exists in the collection. 方法将集合复制到一个数组对象。The method copies the collection to an array of objects. 最后，方法返回的集合中的特定区域的索引。Finally, the method returns the index of a particular zone within the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将类。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class. 代码示例包含三个部分： 两个部分的代码，以及如何运行该示例的说明。The code example contains three parts: two sections of code, and an explanation of how to run the example. 代码示例的第一个部分是一个网页，包含三种控件，其中每个包含单个服务器控件。The first part of the code example is a Web page that contains three controls, each of which contains a single server control. 尽管这些服务器控件所有标准的 ASP.NET 控件，但它们可以充当控制在运行时，因为它们放置在区域。Although these server controls are all standard ASP.NET controls, they can act as controls at run time because they are placed within a zone. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview/CS/webpartzonecollection_overview_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview/VB/webpartzonecollection_overview_vb.aspx#1)] 代码示例的第二部分是包含用于演示的用法的代码的分部类类。The second part of the code example is the partial class that contains the code to demonstrate usage of the class. 此代码处理 Web 页的事件。This code handles the events for the Web page. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview/CS/webpartzonecollection_overview.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview/VB/webpartzonecollection_overview.vb#2)] 在浏览器页面加载。Load the page in a browser. 这三个区域使用时，显示其包含的服务器控件。The three zones are visible with their contained server controls. 页面底部附近的几个的按钮，其中每个演示如何使用的某些方面对象。Near the bottom of the page are several buttons, each of which demonstrates some aspect of working with the object. 单击每个按钮以查看其影响的区域和其内容。Click each button to see its effect on the zones and their contents. 若要查看与每个演示的某些方面的按钮关联的代码对象，此代码示例的第二部分为上面引用的分部类文件中查看的代码。To view the code associated with each button that demonstrates some aspect of the object, view the code in the partial class file referenced above as the second part of this code example.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数可供控件，由 Web 部件控件集中的其他控件或自定义开发人员代码，若要创建的只读集合存在于 Web 部件页的控件。The constructor is used by the control, by other controls in the Web Parts control set, or by custom developer code, to create a read-only collection of the controls that exist on a Web Parts page.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的空实例。

span.span: Initializes an empty instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件使用此构造函数中自己的构造函数初始化的新实例Web 部件页的类。The control uses this constructor within its own constructor to initialize a new instance of the class for a Web Parts page.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.ICollection webPartZones) cil managed

span.span: An of objects.

summary.span: 通过传入 对象的集合来初始化 类的实例。

span.span: Initializes an instance of the class by passing in a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用构造函数时您想要创建的自定义集合要以编程方式上执行操作它们的对象。Use the constructor when you want to create a custom collection of objects to carry out programmatic operations on them. 例如，您可以访问属性并创建子集对象在 Web 部件页上，分配到对象，，然后执行上的子控件或仅的子集的各种属性的操作区域。For example, you could access the property and create a subset of objects on a Web Parts page, assigning them to a object, and then carry out operations on the child controls or various properties of only that subset of zones. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将构造函数。The following code example demonstrates the use of the constructor. 在示例部分中找到该示例的完整代码类概述。The complete code for the example is found in the Example section of the class overview. 在下面的代码段，可以看到它将分配对象通过检索的值的变量属性。In the following section of code, notice that it assigns a object to a variable by retrieving the value of the property. 如果您希望，而不是分配来自所有区域属性，可以创建一个数组对象包含在页上，所有区域的子集，并分配到新数组对象。If you wanted, rather than assigning all the zones from the property, you could create an array of objects containing a subset of all the zones on the page, and assign the array to a new object. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview/CS/webpartzonecollection_overview.cs#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview/VB/webpartzonecollection_overview.vb#6)] 创建集合后，您可以轻松地循环访问集合和所有包含的区域或其内容执行操作。After the collection is created, you can easily iterate through the collection and perform operations on all the contained zones or their contents. 若要执行该示例代码，浏览器中加载的页面，然后单击**切换谓词呈现模式**上每个区域的按钮。To execute the example code, load the page in a browser, and click the **Toggle Verb Render Mode** button on each zone. 这样可改变每个区域中包含的服务器控件的标题栏中的谓词的呈现方式。This alternates how the verbs in the title bar of each server control contained in a zone are rendered. 谓词可以出现在下拉列表菜单中，或直接作为标题栏中的链接。The verbs can appear in a drop-down menu, or directly as links in the title bar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使您能够检查特定对象，并确定它是否在集合。The method enables you to check a particular object and determine whether it is in a collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method. 在示例部分中找到的示例中，包括用户控件、 一个包含区域和包含的代码的分部类文件的页面的完整代码类概述。The complete code for the example, including a user control, a page containing the zones, and a partial class file that contains the code, is found in the Example section of the class overview. 下面的代码段演示如何使用方法。The following section of code demonstrates usage of the method. 若要执行的代码，浏览器中加载的页面，然后单击**coll.包含 WebPartZone2**按钮。To execute the code, load the page in a browser, and click the **Coll. Contains WebPartZone2** button. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview/CS/webpartzonecollection_overview.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview/VB/webpartzonecollection_overview.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法时，你想要创建一个自定义的数组，其中可以包含在区域集合，这些区域的子集或超集这些区域。The method is useful when you want to create a custom array that can contain the zones in the collection, a subset of those zones, or a superset of those zones. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method. 在示例部分中找到的示例中，包括用户控件、 一个包含区域和包含的代码的分部类文件的页面的完整代码类概述。The complete code for the example, including a user control, a page containing the zones, and a partial class file that contains the code, is found in the Example section of the class overview. 下面的代码段演示如何使用方法。The following section of the code demonstrates usage of the method. 若要执行的代码，浏览器中加载的页面，然后单击**数组中的区域名称**按钮。To execute the code, load the page in a browser, and click the **Zone Names from Array** button. 区域的集合加载到一个数组，并且所有区域 Id 都复制到一个标签。The collection of zones is loaded into an array, and all zone IDs are copied into a label. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview/CS/webpartzonecollection_overview.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview/VB/webpartzonecollection_overview.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您有多个方法非常有用区域对 Web 部件页，并且您需要了解一个区域相对于其他区域的序号位置。The method is useful if you have multiple zones on a Web Parts page, and you need to know the ordinal position of one zone relative to the other zones. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method. 在示例部分中找到的示例中，包括用户控件、 一个包含区域和包含的代码的分部类文件的页面的完整代码类概述。The complete code for the example, including a user control, a page containing the zones, and a partial class file that contains the code, is found in the Example section of the class overview. 下面的代码段演示如何使用方法。The following section of code demonstrates usage of the method. 若要执行的代码，浏览器中加载的页面，然后单击**WebPartZone1 索引**按钮。To execute the code, load the page in a browser, and click the **WebPartZone1 Index** button. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使您能够访问对象内通过表示集合中的其序号位置的索引号的集合。The property enables you to access a object within a collection by using an index number that represents its ordinal position in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使您能够访问对象内对特定的区域中使用的字符串标识符的集合。The property enables you to access a object within a collection by using a string identifier for a particular zone. 所有匹配的字符串标识符是不区分大小写。All matching on string identifiers is case-insensitive.
